name: Stick Man Dies
description:
Hello, Welcome to this simple game

Press The Options In The Menu, And Warning, There will be blood

More Death Options Soon, You Can Suggest Me Some

This is My First Animated Working Game, Mobile Support Is Not Yet Tested And Probably won't Work.

I Used Wick Since I Dont have Money For Adobe Animate.

You Can Also Find This Game On Newgrounds: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/785165

V1.0.1

Note: The Button To My YT Is Broken so if you wanna visit my yt here is the link:

https://www.youtube.com/c/MiguelsGamingChannel

Unfortunately, I Won't be able to change the resolution of the game To 1920x1080 Since I Will have to redo the animations All over again.
